messages.title: Your New TEAM!
messages.content: Introducing the new Focus Team for Chapel End - Saeed Diwan, Matt Lake, Andrew Morrell, Farid Ahmed alongside the Chapel End Liberal Democrats Focus Team.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Saeed Diwan is campaigning for better parking.
Matt Lake is campaigning for cleaner streets.
Andrew Morrell has plans for improvements to the Pool & Track.
Plans to use unused Police posts to boost on the beat Police Officers. Objecting to the Mayor's scrap of ID cards that could fund 3,000 more Police.
Farid Ahmed and the local Liberal Democrats are campaigning to stop the planned reduction of 174 beds at Whipps Cross Hospital.

mentions.candidate: Farid Ahmed and the local Liberal Democrats
mentions.tacticalSituation: Only the Lib Dems can beat Labour here! [..] Ladbrokes - Tories 100/1 outsiders in Walthamstow. [..] Tory predictions predict Labour can't win. Labour predictions predict a danger from new Lib Dem votes.

issues.health: Farid Ahmed and the local Liberal Democrats are campaigning to stop the planned reduction of 174 beds at Whipps Cross Hospital.

housing.content: Protect Whipps Cross: Labour's London health bosses are planning major cutbacks at Whipps Cross Hospital. Only Conservatives want to sell off the NHS. Farid Ahmed and the Liberal Democrats will protect the vital services we all rely on.

endorsements.endorsement: Respected bookmakers Ladbrokes are reporting the fighting withdrawal that the Tories have now been forced into. Many local residents are switching back to local champions Farid Ahmed and the Liberal Democrats after 18 years of Labour letting Waltham Forest down.

quotes.text: The Liberal Democrats are now the second party in all of Waltham Forest despite what Labour says.

images.caption: Farid Ahmed and the local Lib Dems are leading the campaign to keep Whipps Cross Hospital from losing beds.
Your new team working with Farid Ahmed campaigning for change.
Nick Clegg and the Liberal Democrats are leading the campaign for more police.
